ygData.subject: The new arrival
ygData.msgSnippet: He decided he had remained out of the conflict long enough. Prime had to be stopped for the good of all Transformers, or at least directed back at the

He decided he had remained out of the conflict long enough. Prime had
to be stopped for the good of all Transformers, or at least directed
back at the Tripredacus.

Engaging his warp drive, he thought of where best to land. He
consulted his geographical data and found a very interesting place.

His ship went faster and faster. He knew he was going to crash land,
but he hadn't really expected to ever come back alive from this place.
He just checked that the security devices protecting his particular
package were functional and engaged the thrusters. On the horizon, he
saw the white of snow and ice.

The crash was horrible, but the ship's systems protected him well. He
opened the canopy and felt the bitter bite of cold. The South Pole,
even in his time, was not a very hospitable region. He had to deal
with it, and the new technologies would help him.

???: Engage Environmental Adaptation Addition.

His body seemed to already accomodate the ice, and in fact even
generated it. His wing became ice-like and his color changed to a more
polar blue.

???: That's already much better!

He opened a communication channel using Maximal and Predacon frequencies.

???: Hello, Brethren. I am here on behalf of the Survivor Council to
get rid of the abomination that dares to call itself Optimus Prime. I
need assistance and support. My name is Protoform Z... I am AzureBlade!
